#### Artifex Spring 2022

Welcome to Artifex!



```{r}



t = mdy("1/24/2022")

Week_of = c(t, t + (1:8 * 7))

syll = data.frame("Week" = Week_of, Topic = letters[1:9] )

kbl(syll) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))

```
